head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LE WINTER, HARRIET

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LE WINTER, HARRIET

block.p: LE WINTER--HARRIET Congregation Sons of Israel, Woodmere, records with sorrow the passing of its member and extends condolences to the bereaved family. Bruce Ginsburg, Rabbi Dr. Saul I. Teplitz, Rabbi Emeritus Sherry T. Bloom, President

$(6$)LeWINTER--Harriet J. on January 9th, 2007. Beloved wife of Robert. Adored mother of Eric and Susan. Cherished grandmother of Brandon and Maxwell. May she rest in peace. Funeral services from ''Boulvard-Riverside'' Chapels, 1450 Broadway, Hewlett, L.I. Thursday at 1:30 pm
